feedback: Correct: The shape of the vase clearly demonstrates craftsmanship
Incorrect: Taste is in the eye of the designer as well as the viewer.
Incorrect: There is uniformity in the shape, but there is no depth to this media to imply that it is contrasting with other figures.
Correct: While a modification of prior work, this is still AI generative work.
Incorrect: While there is a light source and a shadow cast, shading is a term used for pencil based sketching.
Correct: This character is not based on any person, place, or existing trope.
Incorrect: The color scheme, while high contrast in some areas, loses form in others and has written text unrelated to the character.
